subject: Coaches and Managers
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Getting prized basketball players to visit campuses at the right time, planning those visits to the last detail and catering to their families results in “a lot of pressure.”
snippet: Getting prized basketball players to visit campuses at the right time, planning those visits to the last detail and catering to their families results in “a lot of pressure.”
